tool_description: Executes standardized developmental assessments across multiple domains, generating quantitative scores and qualitative insights for milestone tracking.

assessment_date.description: Date and time when assessment was conducted

assessment_type.description: Type of assessment: formal_standardized, informal_checklist, play_based, parent_questionnaire

domains_to_assess.description: Developmental domains to assess: cognitive, language, motor, social-emotional, adaptive

assessor_credentials.description: Assessor qualifications: certified_teacher, developmental_specialist, parent, therapist

assessment_environment.description: Where assessment occurred: home, classroom, clinic, playground

child_cooperation_level.description: Child's cooperation during assessment: excellent, good, fair, poor

specific_skills_focus.description: Specific skills to emphasize in assessment

accommodations_used.description: Any accommodations or modifications made during assessment

error_messages: Invalid profile ID: Profile not found in system
Invalid assessment type: Use formal_standardized, informal_checklist, play_based, or parent_questionnaire
Invalid domain: Use cognitive, language, motor, social-emotional, or adaptive
Invalid assessor credentials: Use certified_teacher, developmental_specialist, parent, or therapist
Invalid environment: Use home, classroom, clinic, or playground
Invalid cooperation level: Use excellent, good, fair, or poor
Future assessment date: Assessment date cannot be in the future
Empty domains list: Must specify at least one domain to assess
usage: Conduct comprehensive developmental assessments by specifying child profile, assessment parameters, and environmental factors. Results provide scores and milestone achievement data.

assessment_id.description: Unique identifier for this assessment session

domain_scores.description: Numerical scores for each assessed domain (0-100 scale)

percentile_ranks.description: Age-normed percentile rankings for each domain

milestones_achieved.description: List of milestones clearly achieved during assessment

emerging_skills.description: Skills that are developing but not yet mastered

areas_of_concern.description: Domains or skills showing potential delays

reliability_score.description: Assessment reliability based on cooperation and conditions (0-10)
